'''''A Tolkien Thesaurus''''', a book in the series ''Garland Reference Library of the Humanities'' (vol. 1326), was the result of four years by [[Richard E. Blackwelder]] in compiling a concordance to the names of characters, animals, and plants in ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'', from prologue through the appendices. A companion booklet, ''[[Tolkien Phraseology]]'', was published in the same year.
